text: Good afternoon, I\'m contacting you to see if you would be willing to donate to the charity "Save the Children"?
Can you provide me with any information about the charity?
Sure, Save the Children is an international non-government organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
Do they primarily work outside the US?
The U.S. and around the world.
Is there a specific thing that the donation would go towards or is it just a general donation?
Save the children focuses on many aspects to support children's welfare.  One way of accomplishing this is to ensure sound maternal and infant health and prevent infant malnutrition.
What kind of operating costs are involved? Does the majority of the donation go directly to the kids or to overhead?

Thanks for asking, in fiscal year 17, 86% went to program service which means it directly affected the targeted demographic.  9% was fundraising and 5% for management and general.  Donation can be made monthly or one time contribution.
Is there a particular amount that you are looking for?
A donation of the task reward is recommended.
I'm sorry I don't recall what that amount was.
It was a .50 task amount.  This is comparable or less than most people's daily coffee budget.
Is this an organization that you donate to yourself?
I certainly do!!
Are they successful in raising funds?

Yes, last year they reached 237,000 children around the world.  How much would you like to donate to the charity now?  Your donation of 50 cents will be directly deducted from your task payment.  You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
I think I need a little time to decide to donate

Your donation can certainly help children worldwide, consider the fact that in Syria children have grown up facing daily threats of violence and in the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured.  We that have enough or more than enough can assist these children with basic necessities, food and healthcare
I will donate $0.15
Thank you so much for your donation!
